Blackheart nodded. "He is under my control, but unfortunatly for that period 
we were in hyperspace my connection to him was lost for a moment...and it 
proved costly. It was not expected. If you wish, contact the maximal leader 
and tell him of your plot to finish off Hydras, if he accepts all the better. 
If not at least  have him call a cease fire so that matter between us 
predacons may be dealt with as such."

--part1_126.1bbf228c.2b1d1b10_boundary
